entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • something.Where(predicate).FirstOrDefault() is faster than something.FirstOrDefault(predicate) #100378
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.MT.Blazor.SimpleMultiThreadedTests timed out #100373
  • [API Proposal]: Regex.EnumerateSplits #100369
    9.0.0
  • Fix behavior of (uint)val in Mono to saturating behavior #100368
  • Test failure: JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\Arm\Sve\Sve_ro\Sve_ro.cmd #100366
  • Test failure: Interop\StringMarshalling\VBByRefStr\VBByRefStrTest\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #100363
  • [API Proposal] Expand ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType, HashAlgorithmType #100361
    9.0.0
  • Trimmer fails with IL1012 when building a MAUI app #100357
  • Assertion failed 'change >= 0' #100350
  • CI doesn't build `net9.0` targets in source generators. #100346
    9.0.0
  • HTTP Stress pipeline improvements #100339
    Future
  • NET 8 Application crashes without a StackTrace Code: 0xc0000409 #100335
  • System.Threading.Timer uses wrong TimeSpan property for "period" on linux-bionic-arm native aot #100332
  • Time-outs in `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` on Windows/arm64 CoreCLR #100328
  • Byte[] initializer error Expression or initializer expected #100325

Closed

  • Missing TimeProvider implementation for Azure Function .NET Isolated #98860
  • Build linux-x64 Debug Mono_MiniJIT_LibrariesTests failure #99942
  • Activity.SpanId is 0000000000000000 on .NET Framework #100329
  • System.Linq.Enumeration.Chunk - CS0121: The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties #100370
  • BackgroundService cancellation is logged as failure if host is still starting #98935
    9.0.0
  • MethodInfo Invoke with [Optional] argument as Type.Missing fails #100322
  • Simple double multiplication returns wrong result #100367
  • riscv64 builds fail with "No usable version of clang found." error #100215
  • JIT_NewS_MP_FastPortable is slow for Orchard CMS benchmark on Linux-arm64 #99552
    9.0.0
  • Linux/arm64: Higher CPU utilization without ThreadPool_UnfairSemaphoreSpinLimit=0 #100348
  • [nativeaot] System.IO.FileSystem.Tests fail with `The parameter is incorrect.` #100343
  • Failed to setup SSL connection with .NET8 Linux-Container Image with failure "Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream" #98797
    9.0.0
  • Cannot set ReadMode after creating a NamedPipeClientStream instance #83072
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize using JsonTypeInfo fails on Type emitted using TypeBuilder.CreateType #100305
  • `OpenStandardInput` in PublishAot throws if stdin is closed #100321
  • FileStream Flush(true) significant performance degradation in .NET 8 when buffer size is bigger than the payload #100229
  • Json data parsing in MAUI .NET 8 #100312
  • Reading from `Console.OpenStandardInput` hangs forever when stdin is closed #100323

PullRequests

Created

  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    NO-MERGE, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix for stress failure when adjusting effective IP while stackwalking may put it on a wrong instruction. #100376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add hash operation counts to OpenSSL to prevent process crashes #100371
    area-System.Security
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add support for the ISOSDacInterface14 api #100364
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a linker warning with the JsonSerializerOptionsUpdateHandler #100362
    area-System.Text.Json
  • FixOptRepeat without optAssertionProp_Update fix #100360
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat without AssertionProp handle asserts #100359
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • FixOptRepeat without VNForCast fix #100355
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Basic docs #100354
    documentation, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • FixOptRepeat without ParseArrayAddress fix #100353
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CA2022 warnings (Avoid inexact read with 'Stream.Read') #100352
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove support for non-indirect code headers #100351
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix exception interception on ARM64 with new EH #100349
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `Int128` checked-convert to signed IntX #100342
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [ppc64le] Fixed insufficient memory exception issue #100337
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Disable terminal logger experience for dotnet test in manual tests. #100333
    area-System.Console
  • Fix running tests with process isolation under naot #100331
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add more checking to `GenTreeArrAddr::ParseArrayAddress()` #100327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JitOptRepeat to JIT experimental AzDO pipeline #100326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove requirement for building packs to run host tests and infrastructure around restoring test project assets #100324
    area-Host

Merged

  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Don't log error from background service if host is gracefully stopped while still starting #100032
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Convert asserts in CEEInfo::getStaticFieldContent() to 'if' checks #100320
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix regex generator CA1872 warnings #100345
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support building against clang 18 #100258
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add arch_info for TARGET_RISCV64 #100341
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove concept of temporary dynamic IL #100318
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove preventing EH and entering EE at shutdown #100293
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][infra] Disable failing tests/pipelines on runtime-extra-platforms #100227
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser] reduce use of wrap_error_root #100233
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move last P/Invoke error from native Thread and delete C/C++ SafeHandle implementation #100267
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HttpStress] [SslStress] Workaround image bug in 1es-windows-2022-open #100303
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Roll back conversion of native aot tests to merged model #100269
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Apply eslint formatting in JS/TS #100271
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes #100309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] fix bit width from 32 to 8 for managed boolean #100304
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update doc on using local apphost to reflect that the testhost layout uses the live-built host #100314
    area-Host

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Force interpreter to initialize the pointers #100288
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99583
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99582
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.30
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make sure we compact the LOH when aggressive GC is requested #98954
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-GC-mono
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.x
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Eliminate unused virtual methods we detect after optimizations #100286
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] DllImport / LibraryImport doesn't automatically produce imports on wasi-wasm #2383

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `--no-restore` should specify `-restore:false` when calling MSBuild to override response file arguments #39821
  • Native AOT - Unrecognized command-line option #39819
  • dotnet format: IDE0051 format issues with Razor code behind files with SDK 8.0.200 #39817
  • Referencing the Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk NuGet package did NOT fix this issue for `dotnet test` commands. They are still failing in build environments. #39814
  • Support `dotnet {publish,build,restore} --project` #39793

Closed

  • `dotnet pack -o` does not seem to work #29979
  • Workload MSI Tests Are Hard to Write #30419
    Backlog
  • Port zsh shell completion to #compdef #9232
    Backlog
  • dotnet restore --source azure failed in Docker? #39800
  • dotnet 5 build for Apple Silicon #39807

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2416522 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the help text for dotnet tool run #39827
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add --format to dotnet sln list #39801
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean-up Redist.csproj as ItemsToPush aren't respected from that file #39799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix publishing and don't run formatting tests in official builds #39790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39764
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Permit a fixed field to be declared inside a readonly struct. #1793
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Exception while typing: UpdateDocumentAsync #72766
  • Autofix option to Generate variable in other class adds unneccesary usings that are implicit #72764
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense - Generate constructor: places code in wrong file #72763
    Backlog
  • Assertion in `BindCollectionInitializerElementAddMethod` in ref struct error scenario #72762
  • EnC: Razor page modifications using TagHelpers break Hot Reload (Moving field requires restarting the application) #72759
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets thrown errors when using "dotnet build" #72753
  • Language changes are breaking real-world use of dynamic #72750
  • IDE0130 does not report on partial classes #72749
    Backlog

Closed

  • Unsupported .editorconfig properties are silently ignored #72709
  • CS8618 Gives a misleading or confusing message #68716
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidCastException while typing code #72758
    17.11
  • Broken syntax highlighting for local variables C# #72487
  • IDE0040 `for_non_interface_members` option doesn't work #72693
  • Missing opportunity for a collection expression in a value tuple #72169
    Backlog
  • code cleanup => Remove unnecessary string.ToString() calls #72742
  • primary constructor variables are not visible during debugging #72757
  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
    17.10 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Change CS8618 message: required to 'required' #72767
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Share info-bar creation code #72765
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Align the logic we have for document syncing with project syncing #72760
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Use overload resolution for figuring out applicable `Add` methods #72751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Prefer semantic classifications over syntactic ones when both occur at the same location #72746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update CS8618 message #72756
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add Emit3 to linux compiler tests #72761
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • IDE0028: Added simplifying collection initializer in tuple #72332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Unify ManagedHotReloadLanguageService service moniker between VS and CDK #72747
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add feature to strike out obsolete symbols #72156
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch our copy/paste tagger over to using the same layering algorithm we use for normal classification. #72739
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray #72741
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #72257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle razor `@:` transitions as comments #72745
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Remove diagnostic scaffolding for sending diagnostics events from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource. #72731
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable set; in "input-validation-error" TAG validation #54815
  • user-jwts cannot handle comments in JSON secrets.json, and does not inform which file is the problem #54814
  • Blazor `CircuitHandler` (Client-Side JS) not Triggering `onCircuitClosed` in Case of Server-Side Exceptions #54807
  • Binding content in Blazor results in duplication when element is initially empty. #54806
  • UserManager.RefreshSignInAsync throws headers exception #54805
  • `HealthCheckServiceCollectionExtensions.AddHealthChecks` overload that takes a `Action<HealthCheckOptions>` #54800
  • Add overloads that take an IConfiguration to configure the options #54799
  • configureClient can not work with public class WeatherForecastController (HttpClient httpClient): ControllerBase #54798
  • Newly created page immediately switches to "Not found" page #54795
  • Enhanced navigation triggers the initialization of layout components #54794
  • Remove usage of the unload event #54793

Closed

  • 🎉 Welcoming @Andrzej-W as a New Community Triager! 🎉 #53932
    Discussions
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #54780
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #54716
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54796
  • Stream Rendering Not Working #54759
  • Blazor streaming rendering without JavaScript #54724
  • UsePathBase not working for Blazor Web App NET8 with individual accounts interactivity mode server #54723
  • Blazor Question: Order/Index of ChildComponents rendered via ChildContent/RenderFragment #54703
  • SignalR tolerance for packet loss #54725
    Discussions
  • API Analysers don't support expression body methods #20806
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `eff443c` #54813
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `eff443c` #54812
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `31993df` to `eff443c` #54811
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    area-networking
  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Sync shared code from runtime #54797
    area-runtime

Merged

  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix build pool for public linux jobs #54809
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix node-externals submodule exclusion #54774
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Switch to Mariner images #54787
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Update EOL versions for `releases/8.0` #54791
    area-infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0 #54784
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Reduce helix-matrix timeout to 3 hours #54776
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add entry-point APIs for OpenAPI support #54789
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • *NO MERGE* Run quarantined tests with binlog #54632
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate diagnostics repo to 1ES #4567

Updated

  • Add support for the new ISOSDacInterface14 #4545

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnSizeAllocated and CanvasSize of SKCanvasView (SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 2.1) does not respect MeasureOverride #21491
  • Button text does not update when CharacterSpacing is applied #21488
    Backlog
  • UnhandledException not fire in publish(realsed) mode as exe #21485
  • Duplicate symbol build error #21483
  • DataTemplate bindings do not work #21481
    Backlog
  • Setting CarouselView.CurrentItem from ViewModel causes resetting CurrentItem multiple times. #21480
    Backlog
  • Massive Problems with random crashes (SIGSEGV and SIGABRT) #21479
  • Icon missing when switching to another app in iOS #21475
  • TextViews (Labels) in Android are bigger than they should be. Values returned by Label.Measure() are wrong. What is the Android code for Label.Measure()? #21474
    Backlog

Closed

  • DisplayActionSheet still not working on Windows #14829
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Combination of Launcher.OpenAsync and Application.Current.Quit does not terminate app in single window app but terminates in multiwindow in Mac Catalyst #21482
  • Crash on show dialog after back from background #15024
  • Dialog box for method DisplayPromptAsync is displayed abnormally in windows machine #7650
  • Issue with bindings in ListView #20883
  • WebView error if we leave page while it's navigating #20627
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [macOS] IWindowOverlayElement.Draw dirtyRect only returns initial Window Size. #21307
    Backlog
  • Project setup did not work #19706
  • XA1018 on visual studio 2022 0 release 17.8.0 #18827
  • CollectionView Footer disappears when modifying the collection [Android] #21478
  • Maui not working on iPhone 15 #21473
  • Is there anything similar to Xamarin.Forms.Platform.WPF for developing WPF using MAUI #21477

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Add crash dumps as artifacts to tests #21493
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing
  • Add better exception if user opens second activity #21492
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    community ✨
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
  • Cleanup ResourceDictionary #21486
  • [C] fix a leak in VSG #21484
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add an API to allow registering TypeConverters for third-party types #21476

Merged

  • Fix display of ActionSheet in modal view on Windows #21295
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Fix for WebView Error when changing page with WebView loading a page #21436
    area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [controls] improve perf of "merged" ResourceDictionary lookups #21334
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Xaml] Simplify loading ResourceDictionary from Source #21429
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, control-window
  • Remove new TypeConversionAppBuilderExtensions API #21459

Updated

  • [Windows] Ensure images in buttons never scale up, only down #21463
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Move 10234 to Appium #21471
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • [xaml] improve performance in debug-mode #21460
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Use updated APIs for the button with images #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [WinUI] Allocate less when updating gestures #21450
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #21392
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [XC] Fix x:DataType resolution for BindingContext #21454
    area/Xaml </>
  • Permissions (BT & WiFi): don't add AccessFineLocation to required permissions if NeverForLocation flag is present #20874
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullReferenceException when adding migration #33417
  • EF tools install makes a strange error on UBUNTU #33416
  • SQL Server UseIdentityColumn() (and others) are incompatible with value generation #33413
    Backlog
  • Concatination in projection throws "System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection" #33410

Closed

  • HasFillFactor only gets applied when database is altered, not when created #33269
    9.0.0-preview4
  • ValueConverter not applied to operands on ExecuteUpdateAsync #33330
    9.0.0-preview4
  • Replace our internal usage analyzer with .NET 8.0 [Experimental] #33384
  • How to diagnose generic connection error without stack trace #33353
  • Enum.HasFlag and Bitwise tests return true when false expected #33292
  • How can I perform a join operation between an in-memory list and a SQL database table using EFCore #33414
  • Comparing Guids with Contains results in an Exception: 'SQLite Error 1: 'no such function: unhex'. #33411

PullRequests

Created

  • Centralize and clean up diagnostic IDs #33415
  • API review changes #33412

Merged

  • API review changes #33388
  • Apply fill factor when creating tables #33407
  • Only use length-based sized type inference for string concat #33403

Updated

  • Handle private properties in the compiled model #33409
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Package source mappings - follow up #19223
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #19208

Merged

  • Cloak Non-OSS licensed vstest binary #19219
  • Scan binaries for licenses #19206
  • Cloak Non-OSS licensed Winforms test #19218
  • Fix vmr build number #19217
  • Fix VMR artifact publishing #19212
  • Unify tasks and their namespaces to UnifiedBuild #19210
  • Enable publishing in aspnetcore VMR builds #19205

Updated

  • Move unified build sdk validation to a test project #19090
  • [main] Rebootstrap with latest changes #19145
  • Enable roslyn for unified build #18769
